701671f-a.text:
Pugsley Ave. (foreground), at the S.E. corner of Westchester Ave. (on which "L" appears). On the north side of the latter Ave., and slightly east of Pugsley Ave., is a new 6-story apartment house under construction, as seen across the elevated structure of the I.R.T. Pelham Bay Park subway line.

July 1, 1928

P. L. Sperr
701671f-a.folder: Pugsley Avenue & southeast corner of Westchester Avenue., Bronx, NY
701671f-a.original_title: Bronx: Pugsley Avenue - southeast corner of Westchester Avenue.
